directory.description: A directory where the lib is placed.
directory.x-prompt: Which directory do you want to create the library in?

bundler.description: The bundler to use. Choosing 'none' means this library is not buildable.
bundler.x-prompt: Which bundler would you like to use to build the library? Choose 'none' to skip build setup.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

tags.description: Add tags to the library (used for linting).

skipTsConfig.description: Do not update tsconfig.json for development experience.

includeBabelRc.description: Include a .babelrc configuration to compile TypeScript files

testEnvironment.description: The test environment to use if unitTestRunner is set to jest or vitest.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

strict.description: Whether to enable tsconfig strict mode or not.

publishable.description: Configure the library ready for use with `nx release` (https://nx.dev/core-features/manage-releases).

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like @myorg/my-awesome-lib. Required for publishable library.

buildable.x-deprecated: Use the `bundler` option for greater control (swc, tsc, rollup, vite, esbuild, none).

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

config.description: Determines whether the project's executors should be configured in `workspace.json`, `project.json` or as npm scripts.

compiler.description: The compiler used by the build and test targets
compiler.x-deprecated: Use the `bundler` option for greater control (swc, tsc, rollup, vite, esbuild, none).

skipTypeCheck.description: Whether to skip TypeScript type checking for SWC compiler.

minimal.description: Generate a library with a minimal setup. No README.md generated.

useProjectJson.description: Use a `project.json` configuration file instead of inlining the Nx configuration in the `package.json` file.
